briefdescription.para: Modbus register mapping for temperature monitoring system.

detaileddescription.para:
Claude Code Session 20250720_221011
2025-01-20
Defines the Modbus register layout for external communication with the temperature monitoring system. Provides register addresses and access methods for device information, temperature data, and configuration parameters.

listitem.para: Support for 60 total measurement points (50 DS18B20 + 10 PT1000)
